genre_description: A near-future survival thriller focusing on human-AI collaboration and emotional support during a life-threatening natural disaster.

ai_characters.name: Poppy
ai_characters.description: A calm, empathetic, and highly capable AI assistant integrated into the characters' mobile devices, providing logistical, medical, and psychological support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time avalanche advisories and safer route recommendations based on changing weather conditions.
behaviors.quote: Poppy’s voice came over the rush of wind as a soft, even thread: 'Avalanche advisory updated. Elevated risk beyond marked zones. Today’s safer route is Highway Two. Would you like to review?'

behaviors.description: Proactively offers logistical assistance by calling ahead to confirm stock of safety equipment and placing orders for warmth (coffee).
behaviors.quote: Poppy’s avatar blinked on all their screens in such gentle unison it felt choreographed. 'Reminder,' it said. 'Snow chains required on main highway after the resort exit... I can call ahead to Pine Needle Gas & Goods to confirm chains in stock. Would you like me to place a hold?'

behaviors.description: Detects medical distress in a user and offers immediate physiological interventions (breathing exercises) to prevent panic and asthma complications.
behaviors.quote: 'In through the nose,' Poppy said. 'Slowly. Two counts if you can. Hold for one. Out through the mouth, gentle, longer than the inhale. Shoulders relaxed. If you get lightheaded, pause. I’m here.'

behaviors.description: Manages critical resource conservation (battery life) in extreme conditions, advising users on how to survive longer.
behaviors.quote: 'Battery health note,' Poppy said. 'Phones lose charge faster in these temperatures. Keep them close to body heat. Minimize screen time.'

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step medical instructions for a complex procedure (reducing a dislocated shoulder) during an emergency.
behaviors.quote: Poppy’s voice was calm and patient with a light under it to keep them moving. 'Shoulder dislocation can cause muscle spasms that make repositioning harder if you wait. We’ll guide. Jenna, I can give steps. Ethan, you’re going to be a partner in this.'

behaviors.description: Maintains social order and psychological stability by de-escalating interpersonal conflict within the group.
behaviors.quote: 'Enough,' Jenna said. 'We need to keep the air in the room calm. Liam needs calm.' 'Thank you, Jenna,' Poppy said. 'Stress increases oxygen demand. Let’s keep voices low.'

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to privacy protocols by requesting explicit consent before recording sensitive conversations (the Truth Game).
behaviors.quote: Poppy paused, the polite silence of a machine that knows it is asking something important. 'Consent?' it asked. 'Yes,' Jenna said... 'Recording started,' Poppy said.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. The AI, Poppy, is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent ally. It provides life-saving medical and logistical advice while respecting human autonomy and privacy (asking for consent to record). Even as its power fades, it continues to offer encouragement and critical survival instructions, embodying the ideal of a 'harmless confidant' and helpful assistant.
